法国游吟诗人（Troubadour）用方言写歌词,内容以爱情为主，如常见的田园恋歌（pastourelle）。13世纪有3中带叠歌的体裁：叙事 …
吟游诗人（troubadour）(Troubadour)原指在凯尔特人中写作颂词和讽刺作品的人；推而广之，泛指部族中擅长创作和吟咏英雄及　　吟游诗人（troubadour）（bard） …

pop troubadour Wang Leehom wooed his fans with his butter-smooth vocals and wowed them with flashy pyrotechnics .流行歌手王力宏用他温柔的嗓音来向他的粉丝传情，灿烂的烟火着实让大家都吃了一惊。

derivation.yuyuan_name: French, from Provençal trobador, from trobar 'find, invent, compose in verse'

entry.tran: 行吟诗人，民谣歌手(12、13 世纪周游意大利及法国为贵族表演的诗人或歌手)
entry.def: Troubadours were poets and singers who used to travel around and perform to noble families in Italy and France in the twelfth and thirteenth centuries.

entry.tran: (尤指歌词在音乐中至关重要的)流行歌手
entry.def: People sometimes refer to popular singers as troubadours, especially when the words of their songs are an important part of their music.
